30.1.behavioral_axis: Notices the rise of desire and lets clarity form before committing.
30.1.shadow_axis: Acts too fast on a mood; burns fuel on the wrong targets.

30.2.behavioral_axis: Channels feelings into sustainable steps and right-sized goals.
30.2.shadow_axis: Suppresses feelings; loses the motivating heat of true desire.

30.3.hd_quote: When desire traps, step back and reassess.
30.3.behavioral_axis: Notices when intensity becomes a loop; takes space to reset.
30.3.shadow_axis: Chases what hurts; confuses intensity with destiny.

30.4.hd_quote: Hold the feeling; release the outcome.
30.4.behavioral_axis: Feels deeply while staying flexible about how it unfolds.
30.4.shadow_axis: Over-detaches; loses warmth and the heart of the mission.

30.5.behavioral_axis: Turns passion into consistent practice aligned with values.
30.5.shadow_axis: Grand passion with poor follow-through; burns allies and bridges.

30.6.hd_quote: Some fires are destined; ride the wave wisely.
30.6.behavioral_axis: Accepts larger forces; chooses skillful participation over control.
30.6.shadow_axis: Fatalism or melodrama; abdicates responsibility to 'destiny.'
